title: Suvarna Mandala Jhumka: Emerald & Ruby Embellished Gold Earrings
materials: 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features genuine Emerald center stone
and brilliant-cut Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones for enhanced sparkle.
features: Intricately designed Mandala pattern. Openwork design allows light to pass through, maximizing brilliance. Embellished with traditional gold ball drops. Classic design elements with contemporary refinement. Superior metal polish for lasting shine.
colors: accented by the vibrant green of the Emerald and the rich red of the Rubies. The CZ stones contribute a dazzling white sparkle.
occasions: and special occasions. Exquisite for a bride's Muhurtham
or half-saree function. Equally stunning for a contemporary cocktail party or formal event.
description: A timeless blend of traditional Telugu craftsmanship and contemporary design. The exquisite gemstone combination signifies prosperity and good fortune. High-quality materials ensure lasting beauty and durability. Versatile enough to complement both traditional and modern attire.
